subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Petr Sykora ended the longest streak in N.H.L. history without a hat trick by a player who had at least two goals in a game, leading the Penguins’ rout of the Islanders on Thursday.
snippet: Petr Sykora ended the longest streak in N.H.L. history without a hat trick by a player who had at least two goals in a game, leading the Penguins’ rout of the Islanders on Thursday.
